innovationFactory: Innovation factory for people, knowledge and technologies
covidInfoText: Your health is very important to us. Therefore, our workshops will only take place under the current safety guidelines of our government. To participate in our workshops it is necessary to be tested, recovered, or vaccinated. You can find more information
workShopCostRefund: If there is a cancellation, the workshop costs will be refunded.
weAreLookingForward: We look forward to seeing you!
inOrderToBookAWorkshopYouHaveToBeLoggedI: In order to book a workshop you have to be registered and logged into your account
name: Name
machineViewRestriction: You have to be logged in, in order to see machine availability!
ifEmailRegistered: If this email-address has been registered on our homepage you will receive an email that contains a link, with which you can reset your password.
becomeACommunityPart: Become part of a vibrant community!
firstStepsInTheGG: Welcome to your first steps in the GRAND GARAGE.   We are an open workshop, a makerspace, a FABLab and much more. Register now and get access to the GRAND GARAGE and our services.
andAcceptTheTermsAndConditions: and accept the terms and conditions.
sentConfirmationLink: We have sent you an email with a confirmation link.
onceAccountConfirmed: Once you have confirmed your account, you can get started.
machineUsageOverview: Soon you will be able to see the usage of our machines
bindingRegistrationText: Your registration is binding. Should you not be able to participate, please inform us immediately at
bookWorkshopLiableToPayTheCosts: Book workshops liable to pay the costs
buyLiableToPayTheCosts: Buy liable to pay the costs
receiptAndGiftCardViaMail: You will receive the invoice and your gift card by mail.
withThisCodeYouCanGetYourCourseEnabled: With this code you can get your course enabled
ohYouDidNotPassTheTest: Oje unfortunately, you did not pass the test.
youHaveToConfirmYourEmailForRegistration: In order to become a member you have to first confirm your e-mail address.
anotherVerificationEmailHasBeenSentTo: Another verification e-mail has been sent to the following address.
youCanFindOurContactInformation: You can find our contact information
receiptAndConfirmationViaMail: You will receive the invoice and the confirmation by mail.
becomeAMemberIn4simpleSteps: Become a member in 4 simple steps!
youMadeTheFirstStepsTowardsBecomingA-GG-: You made the first steps towards becoming a GRAND GARAGE member!
toCompleteOnboardingStartSafetyTraining: In order to complete your registration process you can start the safety training now.
howDidYouLearnAboutUs: How did you learn about us?
memberBenefitsText: By signing up for a membership you become a part of our vibrant community, which will not only enable you access to our machines and devices, but also offer free WIFI and a personalized member card
memberPerksText: Additionally you will get discounts for all of our workshops and the opportunity to buy materials at purchase price
ifYouHaveAnyQuestionsRegardingYourMember: If you have any questions regarding your membership
doNotHesitateToAskOurFrontdeskTeam: do not hesitate to ask our frontdesk team!
differentCardListing: 4you card, student-ID, apprentices (under the age of 28), disability card
pleaseBringAccordingID: Please bring the according ID along, when visiting us for the first time
twoMonthsForFree: Hint: By choosing a yearly membership you get 2 months for free!
howWouldYouPreferToPay: How would you prefer to pay?
sepaAgreementFormText: My membership fee and any resulting additional costs will be deducted from my bank account via a sepa-debit order.
cookiesDescription: This website uses cookies and Google analytics, which also include third party cookies for analytical purposes. We apply cookies for different reasons, such as personalising marketing notifications. For more information about our cookie police please read our
adjustCookiePreferences: You can always change your cookie-settings - to do so, go to your browser settings and select "Cookie-settings".
